hadiths.text: It was narrated from Hamzah bin Suhaib that Umar said to Suhaib:"Why are you called Abu Yahya when you do not have a son?" He said: "The Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) gave me the Kunya of Abu Yahya

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ يُكَنَّى قَبْلَ أَنْ يُولَدَ لَهُ
chapter.eng-name: A man being given a kunyah before he has a child
